data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grichanov, Igor Ya., Kaae, Mathias, Pape, Thomas (2014): Discovery of Setihercostomus Zhang et Yang in the Afrotropical Region (Diptera: Dolichopodidae). Zootaxa 3861 (6): 598-600, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3861.6.7
